# Copilot Instructions â€“ Stock Investment Research Assistant

- This is a Python FastAPI project.
- Uses ChromaDB for vector storage of PDF documents.
- Uses SQLite for structured stock CSV data.
- Uses OpenAI API for LLM and embeddings.
- PDF ingestion via PyMuPDF (fitz).
- Text-to-SQL for structured queries.
- RAG pipeline for unstructured document retrieval.
- All code follows modular architecture under `app/` package.
